languages.text:
В одной из колоний протектората произошло важное событие — ситуация требует личного внимания Вольного Торговца.
Вы можете посетить колонию и выполнить событие в любое время. Информацию о событиях, требующих вашего участия, можно найти в окне управления колониями. Откройте его через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom}.

An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text:
В одной из колоний протектората произошло важное событие — ситуация требует личного внимания Вольного Торговца.
Вы можете посетить колонию и выполнить событие в любое время. Информацию о событиях, требующих вашего участия, можно найти в окне управления колониями. Откройте его через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
An important event has occurred in one of the colonies of your protectorate, which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom}.

An important event has occurred in one of the colonies of your protectorate, which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom}.

An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick-access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text:
Se ha producido un suceso importante en una de las colonias de tu protectorado que requiere la atención personal de tu Comerciante Independiente.
Puedes visitar la colonia y completar el evento cuando quieras. Puedes consultar la información sobre los eventos actuales que exigen tu atención en la pantalla de gestión de colonias. Ábrela desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
Se ha producido un suceso importante en una de las colonias de tu protectorado que requiere la atención personal de tu Comerciante Independiente.
Puedes visitar la colonia y completar el evento cuando quieras. Puedes consultar la información sobre los eventos actuales que exigen tu atención en la pantalla de gestión de colonias. Ábrela desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text:
保護国家のコロニーのひとつで、自由開拓者の助けが必要な重要なイベントが始まった。
いつでもコロニーを訪れ、イベントを完了することができる。コロニー管理画面では、参加を要請される現在進行中の全イベントに関する情報を見つけることができる。クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から開くことができる。
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
保護国家のコロニーのひとつで、自由開拓者の助けが必要な重要なイベントが始まった。
いつでもコロニーを訪れ、イベントを完了することができる。コロニー管理画面では、参加を要請される現在進行中の全イベントに関する情報を見つけることができる。クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から開く。

languages.text:
您的王朝殖民地发生了重大事件，需要您亲自处理。
您可以随时造访殖民地，完成重大事件。您可以从殖民地管理界面中找到相关事件的一切信息。您可以通过{console_bind|RightBottom}来快速访问。
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
您的王朝殖民地发生了重大事件，需要您亲自处理。
您可以随时造访殖民地，完成重大事件。您可以从殖民地管理界面中找到相关事件的一切信息。您可以通过{console_bind|RightBottom}来快速访问。

languages.text:
In einer der Kolonien deines Protektorats ist ein wichtiges Ereignis eingetreten, das die persönliche Aufmerksamkeit des Freihändlers erfordert.
Du kannst die Kolonie jederzeit besuchen und das Ereignis abschließen. Informationen über alle aktuellen Ereignisse, die dein Eingreifen erfordern, findest du auf dem Kolonieverwaltung-Bildschirm. Öffne ihn über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
In einer der Kolonien deines Protektorats ist ein wichtiges Ereignis eingetreten, das die persönliche Aufmerksamkeit des Freihändlers erfordert.
Du kannst die Kolonie jederzeit besuchen und das Ereignis abschließen. Informationen über alle aktuellen Ereignisse, die dein Eingreifen erfordern, findest du auf dem Kolonieverwaltungs-Bildschirm. Öffne ihn über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text:
Un événement important s'est produit dans l'une des colonies de votre protectorat et requiert l'attention personnelle du libre-marchand.
Vous pouvez rejoindre la colonie et terminer l'événement à tout moment. Vous trouverez des informations relatives à tous les événements en cours nécessitant votre implication sur l'écran de gestion des colonies. Ouvrez-le avec l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
Un événement important s'est produit dans l'une des colonies de votre protectorat et requiert l'attention personnelle du Libre-Marchand.
Vous pouvez rejoindre la colonie et terminer l'événement à tout moment. Vous trouverez des informations relatives à tous les événements en cours nécessitant votre implication sur l'écran de gestion des colonies. Ouvrez-le à partir de l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text:
Protektoranın kolonilerinden birinde Hür Tacir'in bizzat ilgilenmesini gerektiren önemli bir olay meydana geldi.
İstediğin zaman koloniye uğrayıp olayı çözebilirsin. Koloni yönetimi ekranında, müdahale etmeni gerektiren tüm güncel olaylar hakkında bilgi bulabilirsin. Hızlı erişimden {console_bind|RightBottom} ekranı açabilirsin.
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen. Open it from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.
